verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3068><s%>, I am Jehovah your God <S%H430><s%>.

After the doings <S%H4639><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, wherein ye dwelt <S%H3427><s%>, shall ye not do <S%H6213><s%>: and after the doings <S%H4639><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, whither I bring <S%H935><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, shall ye not do; neither shall ye walk <S%H3212><s%> in their statutes <S%H2708><s%>.
Mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%> shall ye do <S%H6213><s%>, and my statutes <S%H2708><s%> shall ye keep <S%H8104><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> therein <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah your God <S%H430><s%>.

Ye shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>; which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>, he shall live <S%H2425><s%> in them <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah.

None of you shall approach <S%H7126><s%> to any <S%H376><s%> that are near <S%H7607><s%> of kin <S%H1320><s%> to him <S%H1540><s%>, to uncover their nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, even the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy mother <S%H517><s%>, shalt thou not uncover <S%H1540><s%>: she is thy mother <S%H517><s%>; thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.
The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> shalt thou not uncover <S%H1540><s%>: it is thy father <S%H1><s%>'s nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy sister <S%H269><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, or the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of thy mother <S%H517><s%>, whether born <S%H4138><s%> at home <S%H1004><s%>, or born <S%H4138><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%>, even their nakedness <S%H6172><s%> thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%>.

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy son <S%H1121><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, or of thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, even their nakedness <S%H6172><s%> thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%>: for theirs <S%H2007><s%> is thine own nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

The nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, begotten <S%H4138><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, she is thy sister <S%H269><s%>, thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.
Thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>'s sister <S%H269><s%>: she is thy father <S%H1><s%>'s near kinswoman <S%H7607><s%>.
Thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy mother <S%H517><s%>'s sister <S%H269><s%>: for she is thy mother <S%H517><s%>'s near kinswoman <S%H7607><s%>.

Thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>, thou shalt not approach <S%H7126><s%> to his wife <S%H802><s%>: she is thine aunt <S%H1733><s%>.

Thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy daughter-in <S%H1121><s%>-law: she is thy son's wife <S%H802><s%>; thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.
Thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy brother <S%H251><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>: it is thy brother <S%H251><s%>'s nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

Thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> and her daughter <S%H1323><s%>; thou shalt not take <S%H3947><s%> her son <S%H1121><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, or her daughter <S%H1323><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>; they are near kinswomen <S%H7608><s%>: it is wickedness <S%H2154><s%>.

And thou shalt not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to her sister <S%H269><s%>, to be a rival <S%H6887><s%> to her <S%H1540><s%>, to uncover her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>, besides the other in her life-time <S%H2416><s%>.
And thou shalt not approach <S%H7126><s%> unto a woman <S%H802><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>, as long as she is impure <S%H5079><s%> by her uncleanness <S%H2932><s%>.
And thou shalt not <S%H5414><s%> lie <S%H7903><s%> carnally <S%H2233><s%> with thy neighbor <S%H5997><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, to defile thyself with her <S%H2930><s%>.

And thou shalt not <S%H5414><s%> give any of thy seed <S%H2233><s%> to make them pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire to Molech <S%H4432><s%>; neither shalt thou profane <S%H2490><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of thy God <S%H430><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Thou shalt not lie <S%H7901><s%> with mankind <S%H2145><s%>, as with <S%H4904><s%> womankind <S%H802><s%>: it is abomination <S%H8441><s%>.

And thou <S%H5414><s%> shalt not lie <S%H7903><s%> with any beast <S%H929><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> thyself therewith <S%H802><s%>; neither shall any woman stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> a beast <S%H929><s%>, to lie down <S%H7250><s%> thereto <S%H8397><s%>: it is confusion.

Defile <S%H2930><s%> not ye yourselves in any of these things <S%H428><s%>: for in all these the nations <S%H1471><s%> are defiled <S%H2930><s%> which I cast out <S%H7971><s%> from before you <S%H6440><s%>;

And the land <S%H776><s%> is defiled <S%H2930><s%>: therefore I do visit <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> thereof upon it <S%H776><s%>, and the land vomiteth out <S%H6958><s%> her inhabitants <S%H3427><s%>.

Ye therefore shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%> and mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any of these abominations <S%H8441><s%>; neither the home-born <S%H249><s%>, nor the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> among you <S%H8432><s%>;

(for all these <S%H411><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> have the men <S%H582><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> done <S%H6213><s%>, that were before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H776><s%>, and the land is defiled <S%H2930><s%>);
that the land <S%H776><s%> vomit not you out <S%H6958><s%> also <S%H2930><s%>, when ye defile it <S%H6958><s%>, as it vomited out the nation <S%H1471><s%> that was before you <S%H6440><s%>.

For whosoever shall do <S%H6213><s%> any of these abominations <S%H8441><s%>, even the souls <S%H5315><s%> that do <S%H6213><s%> them shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their people <S%H5971><s%>.

Therefore shall ye keep <S%H8104><s%> my charge <S%H4931><s%>, that ye practise <S%H6213><s%> not any of these abominable <S%H8441><s%> customs <S%H2708><s%>, which were practised <S%H6213><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H2930><s%>, and that ye defile not yourselves therein <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah your God <S%H430><s%>.
